QuestData.Title: Runas the Shamed
QuestData.Description: I fell so quickly, $n. I am not as strong as I once was. We truly do need your help.$b$bOne of these disgusting creatures ran off with several of the whelplings. I heard him called by name:$b$bRunas.$b$bI will survive. Home is not far. You still have strength, though. Slay this Runas before he does any more damage to our brood.
QuestData.RewardText: Keep your distance from that one, $n.$b$bThose fallen elves are all the same. As two-faced as they come.
